title: Sandals® Resorts: Made Of Caribbean [Official Website]
text:
The Caribbean is more than a place—it’s a state of mind. As a family-owned business born and raised here, it’s a state of mind we’ve been in for generations. You could call us experts in the island vacation—aficionados of all the ways you can enjoy a day. Over 40 years ago, we pioneered  all-inclusive resorts  in the region, so guests from everywhere could experience the simple delights of this special place. Whether it’s on land, by sea, or under the water, we’ve got endless ways to indulge your whims and open your senses to the Caribbean’s natural and cultural wonders. Choose from our 17 all-inclusive resorts for adults in  Jamaica ,  Antigua ,  Saint Lucia ,  The Bahamas ,  Grenada ,  Barbados ,  Curaçao , and  Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , each set on a white-sand beach handpicked for its beauty. The Caribbean is calling—how will you answer?

The best all-inclusive value in the Caribbean for total peace of mind.

At Sandals, all-inclusive means you can go all in on vacation mode—so your stay includes all the ingredients for an unforgettable Caribbean getaway, from roomy accommodations to delicious food and drink to a wide range of land and water sports. Whatever path you take, we'll make you feel right at home.

¹Certified divers can join our PADI instructors for scheduled and guided dives daily.

²Complimentary green fees are included at any of our golf resorts in Jamaica and Saint Lucia.

Our Sandals Locations:

Saint Vincent

Antigua

Grenada

Water flows through, under, and around Sandals South Coast, with a modern design inspired by the ocean's restorative power. Rolling tropical acres and rhythmic waves set the tone for a peaceful stay.

Starting from  $ 260   PP/PN

Sandals Ochi embodies the whole range of what Jamaica has to offer. On one end, there’s the sunny beach club bubbling with energy. On the other, you’ll find serene Butler Villas nestled in a 100-acre garden.

Starting from  $ 199   PP/PN

Set right on the water in the widest stretch of Jamaica’s famous Seven Mile Beach, Sandals Negril is a perfect spot to lose track of your time, your shoes, and your worries.

Starting from  $ 256   PP/PN

Sandals Montego Bay is a true original. It sits on an expansive white-sand beach — the largest private beach in Jamaica. This lively, romantic escape from the ordinary is where the world first fell in love with Sandals.

Starting from  $ 276   PP/PN

Sandals Dunn’s River is built into — and inspired by — the surrounding tropical landscape, and lets you experience the natural beauty of this place from within.

Starting from  $ 283   PP/PN

This elegant beach resort features innovative suites including Swim-up Crystal Lagoon Suites and the spectacular Over-the-water Suites. Just offshore, an exotic private island offers a romantic retreat.

Starting from  $ 232   PP/PN

Sandals Royal Plantation serves up truly personal service in a secluded tropical paradise. Tucked into a coral bluff overlooking a private cove beach, this resort features all Butler Suites.

Starting from  $ 285   PP/PN

Tucked away on its own private cove and bordered by a lush forest and gently flowing river is Sandals Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. Featuring stunning Overwater Villas and Beachfront Villas, 12 dining concepts, and 9 unique bars.

Starting from  $ 451   PP/PN

At Sandals Royal Curaçao, you can dive into waters as blue as the island’s signature liqueur and feel the desert air mix with the ocean breeze.

Starting from  $ 357   PP/PN

Sandals Grande St. Lucian sits like a serene garden on the Rodney Bay peninsula, with calm waters, 360-degree views of the Atlantic and the Caribbean, and sunsets that stop you in your tracks.

Starting from  $ 399   PP/PN

An intimate low-rise resort bordered by tropical gardens and white-sand beaches, at Sandals Halcyon Beach soaking up Saint Lucia’s beauty comes naturally.

Starting from  $ 274   PP/PN

Spanning 220 lush acres with sweeping views of the Pitons and the Caribbean Sea, Sandals Regency La Toc is where hills meet beach — and everything just feels right.

Starting from  $ 274   PP/PN

Elegance and ease come together at Sandals Royal Bahamian, a Nassau retreat that combines an amenity-packed beach resort with an offshore island.

Starting from  $ 287   PP/PN

Sandals Grande Antigua sits on the longest (and some say, the most beautiful) beach on the island, and offers multiple ways to enjoy its charms.

Starting from  $ 294   PP/PN

Sandals Grenada is an "if you know, you know" destination, where cliffs and curated landscapes create a secluded paradise on Pink Gin Beach.

Starting from  $ 355   PP/PN

Sandals Barbados brings our signature all-inclusive experience to a secluded, sought-after location that’s brimming with natural beauty.

Starting from  $ 303   PP/PN

Sandals Royal Barbados pairs the sophistication of a classic jet set location with our signature Sandals experience.

Starting from  $ 358   PP/PN
